name: Shapenote singing
description: Singing [Sacred Harp](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sacred_Harp) and [Christian Harmony](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Christian_Harmony) (also know as [shapenote singing](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shape_note)) is almost more lifestyle than hobby really. Have a listen on [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=sacred+harp) or [any music streaming service](https://music.youtube.com/playlist?list=OLAK5uy_nqWWZ-EXneD7w6s3fGw10ePUOnNpnMVZg). Then go to [sacredharp.uk](https://sacredharp.uk) or [fasola.org](https://fasola.org) to find a singing near you.

name: Running
description: Surprisingly (to old me at least) I have am into running now.

name: Board games
description: I really like board games. Not really heavy ones. Just love how bits of cardboard give people such emotional experiences.

name: Chess
description: Getting into playing chess online and with my older son. I found the [Dr Wolf app](https://www.learnchesswithdrwolf.com) a great way to get going.
